subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: As the Mike D’Antoni era begins at the Garden, one thing is certain: It will be a lot easier for D’Antoni to follow Isiah Thomas than for a new Suns coach to follow D’Antoni.
snippet: As the Mike D’Antoni era begins at the Garden, one thing is certain: It will be a lot easier for D’Antoni to follow Isiah Thomas than for a new Suns coach to follow D’Antoni.
